review: I'm really disappointed in the quality of this product.  The interface is as glitchy as it is clunky. The miracast feature doesn't work with my Nexus phone.  The device keeps the HDMI line hot even in sleep mode so my monitor never goes completely off.  The voice search seems to hang in listen mode well after I've completed my request.The selection offered by prime video has improved but this set-top box is not the way to watch the service.  I think I was happier casting from my iPad to the appleTV. (I never thought I'd compare that to anything in a favorable light; but there you have it.)I still love you Amazon, but you need to fix this shrap.
